title: Chip cooling startup Corintis raises $24 million, adds Intel CEO Lip-Bu Tan to board
description: SAN FRANCISCO -Corintis, a Swiss startup promising more rapid liquid chip-cooling technology, has raised $24 million and added Intel CEO Lip-Bu Tan to its board as artificial intelligence fuels demand for better heat management tools for semiconductors.

title: Generation AEO & GEO Services, With Rank Up Academy Set to Empower SEOs Worldwide
description: New Delhi [India], September 25: As artificial intelligence continues to transform how people search, discover, and interact with information, BloomX Solutions, in collaboration with Rank Up, proudly unveils a groundbreaking suite of Answer Engine Optimization (AEO) and Generative Engine Optimization (GEO) services. These new offerings are designed to help brands secure visibility and credibility in a search environment increasingly shaped by AI. Alongside this launch, Rank Up Academy is preparing to open its doors, equipping SEO professionals across the globe with the future-ready skills they need to thrive.

title: 37-year-old MIT techie joins the Forbes 400 list with AI fortune, says AI could write 'Nobel Prize-winning poetry': Who is Edwin Chen?
description: Edwin Chen, a 37-year-old former Google, Facebook, and Twitter employee, has joined the Forbes 400 after his bootstrapped firm Surge AI crossed $1.2 billion in revenue. Holding a 75% stake Chen envisions AI as “rich, warm and creative,” even capable of Nobel Prize-winning poetry. Speaking to Time, he stressed the need for high-quality data to achieve Artificial General Intelligence while warning of its vast unintended consequences.
content:

title: Cubera Cube Launches in India: Ushering a New Era of Audience Discovery and Creative Campaigning
description: Bengaluru (Karnataka) [India], September 25: Cubera Tech India Pvt. Ltd., a global innovator in ad-tech intelligence, today announced the India introduction of its groundbreaking product -- Cubera Cube -- a real-time audience discovery and campaign ideation platform powered by conversational AI (artificial intelligence). Designed for speed, creativity, and collaboration, Cube is now available to Indian marketers, brands, and agencies eager to create more agile, data-driven campaigns with zero setup time and at the lowest cost in the market.

title: Guotai Haitong Securities hosts conference on biopharma and AI in E. China's Shanghai
description: SHANGHAI, Sept. 25, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The 2025 Shanghai pioneering industries conference, hosted by Guotai Haitong Securities, was recently held in east China's Shanghai. The event also featured the 14th pharmaceutical CEO forum and the 5th artificial intelligence (AI) conference.

title: Blue Owl and Qatar’s QIA Set Up $3 Billion Data Center Venture
